mapper.insert: INSERT INTO javaeepluswork.order (GoodsId, GoodsNum, UId, OrderNumber, TotalPrice, CreateDate) SELECT sc.GoodsId,sc.GoodsNum,sc.UId,ordernum.OrderNum,sc.GoodsNum*g.GoodsPrice ,'${Time}' from goods g INNER JOIN shoppingcart sc ON g.GoodsId = sc.GoodsId INNER JOIN ordernum where sc.GoodsId = ${GoodsId} and sc.UId = '${UId}'
mapper.update: UPDATE goods set goods.GoodsStock = goods.GoodsStock - (SELECT GoodsNum from shoppingcart sc where sc.UId = '${UId}' and sc.GoodsId = ${GoodsId}) where goods.GoodsId = ( SELECT sc.GoodsId from shoppingcart sc where sc.UId = '${UId}' and sc.GoodsId = ${GoodsId})
UPDATE shoppingcart set actFlag = 0 where UId = '${UId}' and GoodsId = ${GoodsId} and actFlag = 2
mapper.select: SELECT g.GoodsId,g.GoodsInformation,g.GoodsName,g.GoodsPrice,gp.GoodsPictureString,o.GoodsNum,o.UId,o.GoodsNum*g.GoodsPrice AS total FROM goods g INNER JOIN goodspicture gp ON g.GoodsId = gp.GoodsPictureString INNER JOIN javaeepluswork.order o ON o.GoodsId = g.GoodsId where o.UId = '${UId}'

SELECT g.GoodsId,g.GoodsInformation,g.GoodsName,g.GoodsPrice,gp.GoodsPictureString,sc.GoodsNum,SC.UId,sc.GoodsNum*g.GoodsPrice AS total FROM goods g INNER JOIN goodspicture gp ON g.GoodsId = gp.GoodsPictureString INNER JOIN shoppingcart sc ON sc.GoodsId = g.GoodsId where sc.UId = '${UId}' and actFlag = 2
